name: Offroad 4x4 Simulator Real 3D, Multi level offroading experience by driving jeep and truck
name_original: Offroad 4x4 Simulator Real 3D, Multi level offroading experience by driving jeep and truck
description:
Ume Offroad 4x4 Simulator Real 3D
Are you ready for a real offroad 4x4 experience ? We developed this free game for all offroad drivers, it has a gigantic world with canyons, hills and mountains. Realistic offroad driving experience like no other, extreme precise and accurate offroading simulations and physics. It is your time to ride these jeeps, atv, trucks. We hope you enjoy driving and riding around freely, you will climbing over mountains and be the 4x4 offroad climber of your dreams.

Features:
- Massive open world for unlimited 4x4 offroading, drive around freely ( freestyle driving )
- Real life like graphics and offroad simulation, thrilling experience
- Amazing HD quality ( Optimized size and performance for all mobile devices )
- 4 super quality 4x4 offroad vehicles ( Jeep, truck, atv, buggy and more coming soon )
- Dynamic and realistic physics, reflections
- Real time sand and dust effect
- Easy to use controls
- Many camera options ( out and interior )
- Environment includes small town, mountains, hill and rock
- Multiple game play modes ( free ride, rescue missions racer, tyre collection racing )
- Daily missions ( find secret chests )
- This game is suitable for children and kids ( boy or girl )

Support
Please email us or use our social media about anything you need to state
We will be delighted if you enlighten us about new features you want in our games.

Thank you
We wish for you the best real game play experience in 2016
This free game developed by ume games ( ultra mad entertainers )
